blog.name: thebookish-fangirl
blog.title: The.Bookish.Fangirl
blog.description:
My old username: Booklion12
I'm a bookworm who is also obsessed with music and loves to sing. I'm an obsessive fangirl: more specifically about Young Adult and New Adult books, but sometimes Taylor Swift, Teen Wolf, Marvel movies, etc. P.S. If anyone ever needs to get something off their chest or just needs to talk, I'm all ears :)

summary: October isn't Halloween, it's waiting for Kingdom of Ash
body:
October isn’t Halloween, it’s waiting for Kingdom of Ash

Ever since October started its been a weird blur of days of just like IT’S KINGDOM OF ASH MONTH and waiting till the 23rd…. Like we’re already a week away and it felt like those days passed in a blur but now time is moving extra slow

summary: Fall books: Ultimate romance reads, nonfiction and more
title: Fall books: Ultimate romance reads, nonfiction and more
excerpt: Fall is in full swing, and with it comes a new crop of great books to curl up with. BuzzFeed Books founding editor Isaac Fitzgerald, as well as New York Times best-selling authors Sarah J. Maas and Ann Patchett, join TODAY to round up their top picks, including “The Golden State” by Lydia Kiesling and “Barking to the Choir” by Gregory Boyle.

tags: ONE WEEK UNTIL KINGDOM OF ASH!
summary: SJM’s book recommendations on the Today Show 10/16!
title: SJM’s book recommendations on the Today Show 10/16!
body:
• Fiction: The Kiss Quotient by Helen Hoang
  • Nonfiction: The Husband Hunters by Anne de Courcy
  • Children’s: Can I Be Your Dog? by Troy Cummings

“The final book in my Throne of Glass series is coming out a week from today, and it’s really surreal. I began writing this series when I was 16 years old, and I’m 32 now, so I’ve worked on it for literally half of my life. So it’s going to be really insane to go out there next week and know it’s done.” - Sarah J. Maas

reblog.comment:

  • Children’s: Can I Be Your Dog? by Troy Cummings

summary: Is anyone else...
body:
Is anyone else…

Having trouble getting through the Throne of Glass series again because you know that once you finish the books and once Kingdom of Ash comes out, it’s truly the end of the road for Aelin and everyone we’ve come to love?

Anyone else scared of what KoA has in store for us?

blog.name: books-and-cookies
blog.title: Books are friends, not food
blog.description:
Mary, 30, a lady who has a cottage in a forest and who may or may not be a witch and have the answers to life and everything (lol no, my motto is fake it till you make it). I have loved books ever since I was a little girl. If I could spend my whole day reading, I would. Life unfortunately gets in the way. It's rude, really.

2019 Reading Challenge

Mary has read 3 books toward her goal of 55 books.

tags: i WILL end you if you spoil this book for me
summary: GUYS We’re just 12 days away from the release of Kingdom of Ash, so I just wanted to remind you to PLEASE, for the love of all...
body:
GUYS

We’re just 12 days away from the release of Kingdom of Ash, so I just wanted to remind you to PLEASE, for the love of all that is holy and pure in this gods forsaken world, don’t post any spoilers for at least a month after publication date. A lot of us don’t have access to physical bookstores that will carry the book on release day, and online orders sometimes take a few weeks to arrive. 

So please, PLEASE, at least tag your spoilers for at least one month after publication date. Please allow everyone to experience this book without anyone ruining that. 

Thank you <3

summary: Aelin, with a lush bag: Listen I know we don’t get along with each other but I got you a bath bomb for your birthday. So...
body:
Aelin, with a lush bag: Listen I know we don’t get along with each other but I got you a bath bomb for your birthday. So whenever you’re feeling stressed and need a bath, just fill your bathtub with water and drop this in. I guarantee all your worries will be over.

Lorcan, opening the bag: this is a toaster.

tags: a court of frost and starlight
it is the actual literary equivalent of a christmas special
the characters are learning to cope
but they are also so happy to be alive
and they’re just enjoying that they made it
and i love these characters so much
feysand is an actual Old Married Couple^tm
and the friendships in the court of dreams are gorgeous
it just gave me a lot of feelings guys

blog.name: deertoe
blog.title: hopelessly fantazising about you and me

summary: FIREHEART
body:
FIREHEART

They had entombed her in darkness and iron. She slept, for they had forced her to—had wafted curling, sweet smoke through the cleverly hidden airholes in the slab of iron above. Around. Beneath. A coffin built by an ancient queen to trap the sun inside. Draped with iron, encased in it, she slept. Dreamed. Drifted through seas, through darkness, through fire. A princess of nothing. Nameless. The princess sang to the darkness, to the flame. And they sang back. There was no beginning or end or middle. Only the song, and the sea, and the iron sarcophagus that had become her bower. Until they were gone. Until blinding light flooded the slumbering, warm dark. Until the wind swept in, crisp and scented with rain. She could not feel it on her face. Not with the death-mask still chained to it. Her eyes cracked open. The light burned away all shape and color after so long in the dim depths. But a face appeared before her—above her. Peering over the lid that had been hauled aside. Dark, flowing hair. Moon-pale skin. Lips as red as blood. The ancient queen’s mouth parted in a smile. Teeth as white as bone. “You’re awake. Good.” Lovely and cold, it was a voice that could devour the stars From somewhere, from the blinding light, rough and scar-flecked hands reached into the coffin. Grasped the chains binding her. The queen’s huntsman; the queen’s blade. He hauled the princess upright, her body a distant, aching thing. She did not want to slide back into this body. Struggled against it, clawing for the flame and the darkness that now ebbed away from her like a morning tide. But the huntsman yanked her closer to that cruel, beautiful face watching with a spider’s smile. And he held her still as that ancient queen purred, “Let’s begin.”

- Tower of Dawn #throneofglass #towerofdawn

TOG, ACOTAR, The Grishaverse (Leigh Bardugo), MARVEL, GOT, Legend (Marie Lu) and many more!

Literally just a fan of fantasy and Sci-Fi (and YA-novels). Currently reading: Kingdom of Ash (SO. MUCH. PAIN.) & Luck in the Shadows

Thanks for checking by!

If the Suriel was supposed to know everything, then it’s impossible that he didn’t know that Rhys hadn’t told Feyre about the 2 of them being soulmates.

The Suriel knew exactly what he was saying.

summary: Throne of Glass Characters as John Mulaney Quotes
title: Throne of Glass Characters as John Mulaney Quotes
body:
Aelin: I’m sorry about last night. It’s just that I’m mean and loud. It will probably happen again.

Rowan:  I would not say that, not even as a joke that my wife is a bitch and I don’t like her. That is not true. My wife is a bitch and I like her so much.

Dorian: Woah! That tall child looks terrible! Get some rest tall child! You can’t keep burning the candle at both ends!

Manon: Every new song is about how “Tonight is the night” and how “We only have tonight.” That’s such 19 year old garbage.

Chaol: In personal news let’s talk about my dad.

Yrene: “I think Emily Dickinson’s a lesbian.”

Aedion: none of us really know our fathers… ANYWAY

Lysandra: In terms of like, instant relief, canceling plans is like heroin.

Elide: I am very small, and I have no money so you can imagine the kind of stress I’m under.

Lorcan: I also don’t want me to be doing what I’m doing.

|| YA Books as John Mulaney || SOC || The Lunar Chronicles || ACOTAR || TOG|| The Cruel Prince || Wicked Saints ||

blog.name: fandomlifeofsara
blog.title: Fandoms💖❤️
blog.description:
Just your friendly neighbourhood fandom blog! Current fandoms:

TOG, ACOTAR, The Grishaverse (Leigh Bardugo), MARVEL, GOT, Legend (Marie Lu) and many more!

Literally just a fan of fantasy and Sci-Fi (and YA-novels). Currently reading: Kingdom of Ash (SO. MUCH. PAIN.) & Luck in the Shadows

Thanks for checking by!
